Author: davidw
Content: "The Unconnected", starring Clint Eastwood as an aging entrepreneur who decides to go for that last startup, just for the money.  At first he runs into trouble, with both sherrif paul graham and deputy techcrunch casting a cold glance as he rides into town...

Author: master54
Content:
It seems that the ones getting the most buzz are those who are the best connected, even if your product is better than theirs. In this case, what is the best way to strike back?

(assuming trying to network yourself into his level is futile)

Author: jkush
Content: That's because you're playing with semantics. Ideas are worthless because an idea can't solve a problem. It's the implementation of an idea that solves the problem.

Author: dyu
Content: I go to McGill and our email addresses end with .ca, I think similarly for some other universities in Canada. Interestingly, mcgill.edu does go to mcgill.ca (not emails though, I tried).
